Definition for TRUE: consonantal %in% '+' & coronal %in% '-' & dorsal %in% '+' & low %in% '-' & back %in% c('+','+,-','-,+')
Motivation for variable creation: Creation of a variable tracking the presence of uvulars to enrich the data from WALS_6A Uvular Consonants
Creation of a variable tracking the presence of glottalized resonants to enrich the data from WALS_7A Glottalized Consonants

Definition for TRUE: (continuant %in% '-' & delayedRelease %in% '+' & click %in% '-' & nasal %in% '-') | (continuant %in% '-,+' & delayedRelease %in% '-,+' & click %in% '-' & coronal %in% '+' & nasal %in% '-') | (continuant %in% '-,+' & delayedRelease %in% c('+','-,+') & click %in% '-' & dorsal %in% '+' & nasal %in% '-') | (continuant %in% '-' & delayedRelease %in% '+' & dorsal %in% '-' & click %in% '-' & labial %in% '+' & nasal %in% '-')
Linguistic note regarding definition: Some affricate segments are written as a stop followed by a fricative in a slightly different way, and having a stop followed by a fricative if both are coronal or both are dorsal captures these.
